column4: hello im on a live cd kubuntu and i downloaded the kpp packages and i only could save them to my ntfs drive
it wont let me write to the xubuntu drive
do you no how i could transfer them to the xubuntu drive thru a terminal? because i cant open the ntfs drive in xubuntu until i install these pkgs
What happens when you try to save to your Xubuntu partition? You also shouldn't need any extra packages to mount ntfs partitions in xubuntu.
